set.seed(1)
Test <- ifelse(runif(50, 0, 1) < 0.69, rnorm(50, 25, 4), rnorm(50, 28, 4.3))


x <- c(89.3, 97.2)
y <- c(12.1, 8.5)

c(-0.75*(((Test)-x)/y)^2)
